alert.note: Alert for Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 11:31PM CDT until August 09 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 1115 PM MDT. * At 1030 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Grant, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Grant, Madrid, Elsie, Brandon and Wild Horse Spring. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 54 and 72. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
